dc_title_s: Dreher's mile square index map of the city of Indianapolis
dc_description_s: The crossroads of America.; Includes one mile distance circles centered on Monument Circle, street index and advertisements.; Includes Dreher's county, township and 'all the roads' map of Central Indiana : showing all dedicated highways--improved and unimproved--state roads, main inter-county roads, townships, cities, towns and villages of the environs of Indianapolis, indexes and advertisements on verso.; Includes indexes. Scale approximately 1:31,000.
